title: i will spend my money back to perfect world and aion
body: seriously i keep getting afk ban everyday my god am gonna leave lol go back to my  normal online game am spending money there without gettting afk if my internet power cut they wont ban me if i relag everyday i get 20min 5games ban for afk even if my power was off then on am tired of this stupid law 4week now everyday am done with fu,cking LOL tired of your stupid law u need to stop abuse my account with timer ban sick and tired of it am done with this stupid game i take my money somewhere else geez
